item.title: My sql problem
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

Nowhere. Just type that in then push enter.

Example:

USE DATABASE databasename (
CREATE TABLE `bankitems`,
  `playerid` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  `bankslot` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `bankitem` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `bankitemn` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY  (`playerid`),
  KEY `bankslot` (`bankslot`)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

Read full topic

item.title: My sql problem
item.dc:creator: @ianternet ianternet
item.description:
@ianternet wrote:

Thanks this is what im adding
so were do i put USE DATABASE

[code]CREATE TABLE bankitems (
playerid bigint(20) NOT NULL,
bankslot int(11) NOT NULL,
bankitem int(11) NOT NULL,
bankitemn int(11) NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (playerid),
KEY bankslot (bankslot)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE equipment (
playerid bigint(20) NOT NULL,
equipslot int(11) NOT NULL,
equipment int(11) NOT NULL,
equipmentn int(11) NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (playerid),
KEY equipslot (equipslot)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE items (
playerid bigint(20) NOT NULL,
itemslot int(11) NOT NULL,
item int(11) NOT NULL,
itemn int(11) NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (playerid),
KEY itemslot (itemslot)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE players (
playerid bigint(20) NOT NULL auto_increment,
username varchar(12) NOT NULL,
password varchar(32) NOT NULL,
rights int(11) NOT NULL,
absX int(11) NOT NULL,
absY int(11) NOT NULL,
height int(11) NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (playerid),
KEY username (username)
) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;

CREATE TABLE skills (
playerid bigint(20) NOT NULL,
skillslot int(11) NOT NULL,
level int(11) NOT NULL,
xp bigint(20) NOT NULL,
PRIMARY KEY (playerid),
KEY skillslot (skillslot)[/code]

Read full topic
